name: Battle Tanks (itch) (flyingcat)
description:
Requires internet connection always ON and 2 players minimum. maximum 5!

Multiplayer Game = You create a room > Your friends join this room > You Start the Game!


++== Two Game types ==++

Time Deathmatch > Select how many minutes do you want to play uninterrupted!

Kills Deathmatch > Select how many times do you want to kill your adversaries during the game!


You can play with touch screens, joysticks and even keyboards!
Options menu give to you access to configure endless devices for playing!


== Remember ==

moving the tank > Need a device with two axes!
change turret firing direction > Need a device with two axes!


Enjoy the game with your friends!
